title: Rooibos Iced Tea with Citrus & Mint
description: Chill strong rooibos and serve with citrus slices, mint, and honey.

title: Rooibos Latte
description: Brew rooibos espresso-style, top with steamed milk and a dash of cinnamon.

title: Spiced Rooibos Chai
description: Simmer rooibos with chai spices and serve with milk.

title: Rooibos Smoothie Booster
description: Blend rooibos with banana, berries, almond milk, and chia seeds.

title: Rooibos Lemonade
description: Mix rooibos, lemon juice, sweetener, and serve with ice.

title: Rooibos Apple Cider Tonic
description: Mix rooibos with apple cider vinegar, honey, cinnamon, and lemon.

title: Rooibos Hot Chocolate
description: Warm rooibos with cocoa powder, milk, and vanilla.

title: Rooibos Pineapple Refresher
description: Blend rooibos with pineapple juice, lime, and mint.

title: Rooibos Mango Lassi
description: Blend mango with rooibos, yogurt or coconut cream, and cardamom.

title: Rooibos Coconut Cooler
description: Combine rooibos, coconut water, lime juice, and honey.

title: Rooibos Watermelon Slush
description: Blend rooibos tea with frozen watermelon chunks and a hint of lime.

title: Rooibos Orange Ginger Fizz
description: Mix rooibos with orange juice, grated ginger, and sparkling water.

title: Rooibos Vanilla Protein Shake
description: Blend rooibos with vanilla protein powder, banana, and almond milk.

title: Rooibos Apple-Grape Juice Fusion
description: Mix rooibos with fresh apple and grape juice.

title: Rooibos Pomegranate Cooler
description: Stir rooibos with pomegranate juice, mint, and ice.
